item.description:
A new Ultimate Frisbee group is starting for the North Shore. So far, we've had one Meetup (through Craigslist) and had some interested people show up. I would love to have enough people join to have full games, but I am content to just throw the disc around as well.

So, let's get out there and enjoy the rest of the good weather for the season.

We'll be meeting every Thursday at 6:15 on the Salem Common and playing until it becomes dark.

(Just so you know, I'm David and you'll recognize me because I'm quite tall with red hair.)


I hope to see you there.

group.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup
